experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines for internal business intelligence. Implemented data quality checks and monitoring systems. Worked with a team of engineers to migrate data infrastructure to AWS.

Designed and implemented scalable data solutions for global clients. Led a team of engineers in building a data warehouse using Snowflake. Developed data models and implemented data governance policies. Mentored junior engineers.

Lead architect for data platform modernization initiative. Responsible for designing and implementing a cloud-native data platform using AWS services. Implementing data streaming solutions using Kafka. Focus on infrastructure as code (Terraform) and automation.

education.description: Focused on algorithms, data structures, and database systems. Conducted research on distributed data processing.
Completed a professional certificate program focused on statistical modeling, machine learning, and data visualization using Python.
